name: Slow Connection - No matches for channel autocomplete (e.g. ~channelname)
precondition: Run these tests on https://mysql.test.mattermost.com/

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
No matches for channel autocomplete (e.g. ~channelname)
––––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Go to a chat or channel
  2. Simulate a slow network connection to ease reproducing. (e.g. Chrome DevTools ➜ Network Tab ➜ Slow 3G)
  3. Type "~doesnotexist" and immediately press enter.
inline.expectedResult: • The post "~doesnotexist" is created and sent, unless `CTRL+ENTER` is enabled (Settings ➜ Advanced ➜ Send messages on CTRL+Enter), which then just adds a new line to the draft after the typed text.
